identifier.description: Identifier(s) by which this encounter is known.

status.description: The current state of the encounter (not the state of the patient within the encounter - that is subjectState).

class.description: Concepts representing classification of patient encounter such as ambulatory (outpatient), inpatient, emergency, home health or others due to local variations.

priority.description: Indicates the urgency of the encounter.

type.description: Specific type of encounter (e.g. e-mail consultation, surgical day-care, skilled nursing, rehabilitation).

serviceType.description: Broad categorization of the service that is to be provided (e.g. cardiology).

subject.description: The patient ro group present at the encounter.

subjectStatus.description: The status of the patient within the encounter.

episodeOfCare.description: The EpisodeOfCare that this encounter is a part of.

basedOn.description: The patient ro group present at the encounter.

careTeam.description: The patient ro group present at the encounter.

partOf.description: Another Encounter this encounter is part of.

serviceProvider.description: Another Encounter this encounter is part of.

participant.description: The list of people responsible for providing the service.

appointment.description: The appointment that scheduled this encounter.

virtualService.description: The list of people responsible for providing the service.

actualPeriod.description: The start and end time of the encounter.

plannedStartDate.description: The start and end time of the encounter.

plannedEndDate.description: The start and end time of the encounter.

reason.description: Reason the encounter takes place (core or reference).

diagnosis.description: Reason the encounter takes place (core or reference).

account.description: The set of accounts that may be used for billing for this Encounter.

dietPreference.description: Diet preferences reported by the patient.

admission.description: Details about the admission to a healthcare service.

location.description: List of locations where the patient has been during this encounter.
